attributes.action: Protect flat owners from the cladding scandal by signing the amendment
attributes.background:
MPs are resisting signing the McPartland–Smith amendment to the government’s Fire Safety Bill

this is giving leaseholder the impression the government is attempting to hold Leaseholders accountable for the corruption that exists in the building industry that led to this issue

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give leaseholders more legal protection and consumer rights: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551675

Implement select committee recommendations on cladding to protect leaseholders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550908
